titles.title: COUNTER Act
Comprehensive Operations for Unmanned-System Neutralization and Threat Elimination Response Act
COUNTER Act
To protect the United States and assets of the United States from incursions.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committees on Transportation and Infrastructure, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
